description:
A three part tool that allows you to look up definitions, find synonyms, or bust a rhyme!

Search from multiple dictionaries at one time including WordNet & the Collaborative International Dictionary of English.

Find synonyms, antonyms, related words and similar words with one click from the thesaurus. 

If that's not enough, you can list rhymes by searching against over 170,000 words.

Internet access is required for this application to work.
